channel.title: Vps running server error PI
channel.description:
Well when i run my server on my vps i just bought it spams like non-stop mysql errors... I have highscores, webclient, vote4cash, and donating, is that why it's spamming the errors?
I'll try and post the errors.
Help appreciated thanks!!
Edit: Heres the error! [code][6/29/12 2:31 PM]: [Region] DONE LOADING REGION CONFIGURATIONS [6/29/12 2:31 PM]: Server ONLINE. [6/29/12 2:31 PM]: com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.CommunicationsException: Comm unications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,340,976,693,583 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 0 millisecond s ago. item.title: Vps running server error PI
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

Well when i run my server on my vps i just bought it spams like non-stop mysql errors… I have highscores, webclient, vote4cash, and donating, is that why it’s spamming the errors?

I’ll try and post the errors.

Help appreciated thanks!!
